name: The Blackpine Outbreak
description:
This is an environment created in Unreal Engine 4 featuring a post apocalyptic setting, taking place in a small town near the Canadian Border. Explore the environment.... someone might need your help!

Visit my Artstation for more info!

https://www.artstation.com/artwork/qAm0AL

This project has been in the works for 10 months and I am happy to release it to the public! I certainly hope you guys enjoy my project. Be sure to leave your feedback in the comments below. I also invite people to record and upload their playthroughs of the game, as I enjoy watching them!
